pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Pick wall / floor / stairs color from a pre-set list on inspector

content.raw:
Done. But.... 

1. Is it ok the way I summed it up, or should I mention all new functions?

2. I haven't updated the changelog for any of the previous editor-related pull requests, unless they changed something outside the editors. Should I add those entries now?
